name: Lost Remnant: The End Tides
description:
Your grandfather has passed away and left you everything he owned.
It's up to you to make a life for yourself as a Fisher on the shore of Vincove.
You will soon discover that there is far more to the world around you, than a life of fishing.
Discover lore-rich messages in bottles from the local denizens of Vincove.
Utilize all the tools at your disposal. Some of which you will wholly not understand.
Discover your Grandfather's final secret.
And just maybe, you'll escape Vincove's fate.


  • Free!
  • A Mysterious Point and Click Adventure.
  • Fishing.
  • Nurture Entities that you won't wholly comprehend.
  • Crafting.
  • Collect useful Resources and Discover Hidden Items Throughout the Game.
  • Non-Violent.
  • Find Lore Through Messages in Bottles.
  • A 2-3 Hour Adventure of Discovery.


Join the community on Discord!


Aside from being a solo game developer, Jeff Sproul is also the Author of the Sigil Online book series on Amazon.
